Title: 23 JEWEL 12 SIZE 14K WHITE GOLD HAMILTON MASTERPIECE POCKET WATCH W/ORIGINAL BOX
Description: Hamilton High Jewel (23) in Premium Condition, 12-Size, 14K Solid Gold “Masterpiece” Pocket Watch with Mint Original Box U.S.; Hamilton; Man’s; Serial# 3,012,423; C. 1937 CASE: The 14K white gold, 12-size, No. 0,122,120 open face case is signed “Hamilton”. DIAL: This silver dial displays Arabic numerals, baton hands and is signed “Hamilton”. MOVT: This 23-jewel, stem-set, No. 3,012,423 movement has 5 adjustments with lever escapement is nickel with a bridge style layout and is signed “Hamilton Masterpiece”. CONDITIONS: C 3 (The case is in very good condition) D 2 (The dial is in perfect condition) M 2 (The movement is in perfect condition) A great 23-jewel Hamilton marked “Master Piece” on the mint movement and solid silver drapery striped dial. The white 14K solid gold Hamilton has a hinged double back case and fancy Hamilton writings on the inside of the back lid. There is a presentation on the Cuvette to Henry McFaden President by the 1928 Charlotte Rotary Club and has a beautiful professional star design H. M. M. in center. This is one of Hamilton’s highest-grade watches “The Master Piece”. Comes with a mint original blue velvet interior Hamilton box.
